H0.text: Which singer picked up three Ivor Novello awards in May, including songwriter of the year for her hit single, The Fear. Lady Gaga

H1.text: Which singer picked up three Ivor Novello awards in May, including songwriter of the year for her hit single, The Fear. Katy Perry

H2.text: Which singer picked up three Ivor Novello awards in May, including songwriter of the year for her hit single, The Fear. Taylor Swift

H3.text: Which singer picked up three Ivor Novello awards in May, including songwriter of the year for her hit single, The Fear. Lily alen

A4.text: Her work on this album with Greg Kurstin earned her the Songwriters of the Year at the 2010 Ivor Novello Awards, and she also won Best Song Musically and Lyrically and Most Performed Work for 'The Fear'.
